text: #COVID19: Only in Singapore :-) A robotic 🐕 patrolling a park in 🇸🇬 to monitor adherence to social distancing rules. In NYC, that robot will be a pile of scrap metal in 5 min; I can only imagine what will happen to that 🤖 if deployed in Texas?!  https://t.co/JQrsZ9SmP2

#COVID19 *Absence of Evidence is NOT Evidence of Absence* How many times did we hear in Feb/Mar—no Evidx that asymptomatic spread occurs, no Evidx that 😷 work? Well ASx Sprd DOES occur, 😷 is #BetterThanNothing. #SEIR #ThinkOfThyNeighbor #FlattenTheCurve  https://t.co/TcjMYxkyJ0

#COVID19 Animal Models: 500,000 minks culled in Dutch mink farms to stop spread of #SARSCoV2. If the animals are going to be killed anyway, can’t they donate a small number to scientists for animal modeling studies?!  https://t.co/TpLZ2mR8OD
#COVID19 #COVID19usa  More than 150 years after the Civil War, an invisible line revealed by an invisible enemy. Cases surging. https://t.co/kkTjmZ0Qf6

#COVID19 vaccines. And all this effort for a SARS-CoV-2 specific vaccine. Really? Should we not aim for at least a pan-sarbecovirus vaccine? Or at least plan towards one? Technically, we haven’t ruled out ADE yet. If the phenomenon becomes obvious only in Phaae III... 🤯😓🤭

#COVID19 vaccines. Even worse, how to test avalanche of samples for neut Abs? For any ONE vaccine to get to phase III, are we going to test 20,000 samples x3 rep x 8 pt dilution (X2 ‘coz that’s biology!) = ~ 1 million microneut assays at BSL3? Need Down Selection Strategy now! https://t.co/A63I1VLbjT

#COVID19 mitigation & suppression measures (Test, QT &😷) work to #FlattenTheCurve. Issue is settled. But when data comes up that confirms what we know will happen when #PubHealth advice is ignored, people still try hard to find alternative explantions. #TheVirusCaresNot https://t.co/3Rnmt3W23J https://t.co/whxUsbj5mp

#COVID19 Kawasaki-like Multisymptom Inflammatory Syndrome. #kawasakidisease is one of those eponymous diseases you hear once in med sch & never forget. Dr. Kawasaki described this disease in 1967! Died two weeks ago (June 5) age 95. His name lives on. RI☮️ https://t.co/ztasDGVGJr
